title: Odd or Even
description: Given an integer N, determine whether it is Odd or Even. Return "Even" if divisible by 2, otherwise return "Odd".

title: Days to Weeks and Days
description: Given an integer N representing days, convert it into number of complete weeks and remaining days.

title: ASCII to Integer
description: Given a character ch, return its ASCII value as an integer.

title: Factorial of Number
description: Given a non-negative integer n, return n factorial (n!).

title: Nth Fibonacci Number
description: Given an integer n, return the nth Fibonacci number where F(n)=F(n-1)+F(n-2).

title: Check Prime Number
description: Given an integer n, determine whether it is a prime number and return true or false.

title: Add Two Arrays With Different Lengths
description: Given two arrays of possibly different lengths, return a new array representing their element-wise sum. Missing elements are treated as 0.

title: Right-Angle Star Triangle
description: Given an integer n, print a right-angled triangle of stars with height n.

title: Age Category with Validation
description: Given an integer age, return Child, Teen, Adult, Senior or Invalid Age based on given ranges.

title: Difference of Two Numbers
description: Given two integers a and b, return the absolute difference |a - b|.

title: Palindrome Number
description: Given an integer x, return true if it is a palindrome, otherwise false.

title: Reverse Integer
description: Given a signed 32-bit integer x, return the reversed integer. Return 0 if it overflows.

title: Swap Two Numbers Without Temporary Variable
description: Given two integers a and b, swap their values without using a temporary variable.

title: Hello + Name
description: Read a name and print the word "Hello" followed by a space and the given name.

title: Average of N Numbers
description: Given n numbers, compute and print their average.

title: Largest of Two Numbers
description: Given two integers, print the largest number. If equal, print that number.

title: Largest of Three Numbers
description: Given three integers, determine and print the largest among them.

title: Print All Elements of an Array
description: Given an array of integers, print all elements in the same order separated by spaces.

title: Print First 10 Odd Numbers
description: Print the first 10 positive odd numbers starting from 1.

title: Print First 10 Even Numbers
description: Print the first 10 positive even numbers starting from 2.

title: Check Positive, Negative, or Zero
description: Given an integer, determine whether it is Positive, Negative, or Zero.

title: Check Leap Year
description: Given a year, determine whether it is a Leap Year based on divisibility rules.

title: Number Triangle Pattern
description: Given an integer N, print a right-angled number triangle from 1 to N.

title: Square of a Number
description: Given an integer N, print the square of the number (N Ã— N).
